body.name: CUKOR Electric Hot Plate, Double Cast Iron 2 Burner,1800W Countertop Burner, Dual Electric Stove Burners, Portabel Electric Cooktop,Portabel Double Burner for Cooking

features: CONVENIENCE: Being small in size and light in weight, the compact design means the burner consumes little space in cabinets or on countertops, thus can also be a perfect travel solution. Easy cleaning with wet cloth. It is an ideal choice in many places such as student dorms, offices, campsites, RVs and home. Cast-iron hot plate needs to be preheated for 10 minutes for best use, and cools down gradually, keeping the food warm longer. Please do not touch the burner body when in use.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: Perfect solution for frying, stir-frying, and slow cooking, it can also be used for home-style Teppanyaki and BBQ with a barbeque plate and rack (not included). The burner can be used with any flat-bottomed cookware made of a variety of materials -- frying pans, woks or stovetop teapots made from aluminum, stainless steel, ceramic or glass. Works with 120V/1800W power supply.

SAFE & DURABLE: The burner includes advantages like: no radiation, no open flame, no carbon monoxide, and voltage and thermal regulators for your protection. Built with stainless steel for durability, it will support cookware as heavy as 22 lbs. As a partner of Amazon, our factory has passed BSCI certification, and all our products are certified by ETL.

ECO-FRIENDLY& EFFICIENT: The burner cycles on and off to maintain the desired temperature automatically. It is equipped with a thermal fuse for overheating protection. Other advantages include: voltage regulator, flameless, no carbon monoxide, no radiation and no stovetop required. It is safe and saves 30% electricity compared with traditional induction cookers.

WARRANTY: Our product comes with a 30-day return policy and an 18-month free replacement policy for your worry-free customer experience. Please contact us should you have any questions, and we will get back to you in 24 hours. Note: Please cover your cookware with a lid when it is used to boil water.Note:Please clean the burner after it cools down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our company is dedicated to the design and manufacture of kitchen appliances, and we devote ourselves to providing customers with products of highest performance-cost ratio, providing the perfect shopping and use experience from quality to service. This is perfect when you need an extra burner,food warmer plate, or as an alternative kitchen stove to entertain a large group of people. CUKOR hot plate is ideal choice for compact living areas where they can effectively replace the use of other kitchen stoves. More energy efficient and convenient.

Convenient temperature adjustments with big controlling knob. Built with corrosion resistant cast iron heating elements for durability. Working Indicator(The burner cycles on and off to maintain the desired temperature automatically)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Hot Plate When You Need Stovetop Cooking!
reviews.reviewText: When our kitchen was being renovated, I bought the Cukor hot plate with two burners. It has worked perfectly. It gets hot quickly and stays hot, so the food gets cooked properly. It is as easy to use as anything can be. Just turn the knob under the burner you want to use to high, and you are cooking in no time. It got the water boiling in my 8 quart pot about as quickly as my gas range did. The only issue is that the temperature is either high or off. Turning down the knob just turns the heat off. But that wasn't a problem for us. We just adjusted our cooking time and strategy. The hotplate is easy to clean, and after 3 months of heavy use, it still looks new, and it works just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything worked great! The frame does get warm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cukor counter top stove
reviews.reviewText: The stove heats quickly and I like the knobs. It is a bit small, which was a bit of a disappointment. It works for me and my cast iron Cookware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our stove broke and this is perfect, not sure if we’ll now purchase another stove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little devices pumps out some heat and has been an absolute lifesaver while we waited for our new gas range. We cook all the time and being without the ability to cook would drive us mad. I read through a lot of reviews and landed on this one. It boils water relatively fast and depicted is a turkey chili being made. Very impressed !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars WELL, I STARTED OUT WITH FIVE STARS, BUT THEN.
reviews.reviewText: 01/31/2024 UPDATE UPDATE:This little hot plate worked just fine for a little over two years.Then the PLASTIC control knob started getting loose due to the heat distortion and I ended up using a small pair of vise grips to control the temperature.Really?You use plastic for a heat adjustment knob on a stove?How tacky is that?Then it sometimes would turn down/off when I needed it to and then again, sometimes not.Now it will not turn completely off. It gates down to what I would estimate to be about the number 2 setting.So,,, I'm taking back two stars and saving them for something that will last more than a couple years.12/13/2022 UPDATE:Well, it's been almost two years now and this little gizmo is a workin still.I am more than a little surprised that for about $32, this has held up so well./Before this, I bought a Duxtop for about $75-$80 and it only lasted about two months. A total turd!I guess I'll mention that the paint around the heat control knob is coming off which is no big deal at all.And, the control is starting to feel a little wonky but it still works just fine.It still boils a 2-quart kettle of water in about five minutes (about like when it was new).After two years, I have absolutely no complaints about this hot plate.Original Review:09/19/2021 AU:WELL, I'VE HAD THIS COOK TOP FOR ALMOST A YEAR NOW AND WITH VERY FEW EXCEPTIONS, IT STILL WORKS VERY WELL. IT IS SO DIFFICULT TO FIND A COOK TOP THAT WILL HOLD UP FOR MORE THAN A MONTH OR TWO.I STILL LIKE IT!!!ORIGINAL REVIEW:I've only had this single burner hot plate for one day so this review is an initial observation.It has a weight and feel to it that makes you think it is a high quality product.The heat control moves smoothly and does not feel loose or wobbly.The plate heats up reasonably quickly and boils a 2-quart pot of water in just a few minutes. I even used my cast iron wok on it and it performed very well.The non-slip feet all touch down at the same time so the appliance is not wobblyI have gone through a few hot plates with less than stellar luck over the last two years so I will monitor this one and check back with a review update from time to time.For now though it seems like an all around winner.Thanks//(~_~)\\AU

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and easy to use hot plate
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this hot plate just a few days ago. I am very impressed with the fast delivery and quality of the package! Hot plate heats up quick and holds the heat for a while after it turns off, which is great when you want to keep something to stay warm until you are ready to eat. This will be great for carrying in the trips during hurricane season and also will be great for college kids. So far I am very happy with the product. Cord is also a nice length.I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has a small size kitchen or kids in collage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great portable stove!
reviews.reviewText: This little portable stove is really a good choice for us! We bought it so we can cook when on road trips. It works well and is simple to use. It takes longer to heat up then a regular stove, but that’s to be expected. A very nice product!

Calienta igual de rapido que una estufa de gas, y a temperatura baja tarda mas tiempo en llevar un baso de agua a ebullicion. Ahorra dos tercaras partes de lo que gasto en gas y el costo de la luz es el doble de lo que pago, solo la uso yo todos los dias y me he ahorrado dinero.

La placa calienta muy rápido, solo la primera vez que la use tardo de 8 a 10 min. en calentar y salió un poco de humo, la uso diario 2 veces y sin problemas, el cable mide aprox un metro así que hasta ahorita excelente
la perilla de control de temperatura por su posiciòn se calienta mucho y no permite sartén o comal de mayor tamaño que su parrilla
